name: Door To Door
description: You are Bixby, an agent within the bureaucratic metropolis known as the Ministry Of Order. As Lounge District's go-to detective, take a stroll through a retro-future so analog it'll make your head spin.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Processor 2.4GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible; AMD Radeon HD 6770/NVIDIA 550ti DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel Quad Core Processor/AMD Hexacore Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible; AMD Radeon HD 7870, R9 270/ NVIDIA 670, 760 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
